Subject: RE: Urgent. I have a new alleged victim of E I have a  new client who was a victim of Epstein. She is willing to fly to

I would say yes but we're pretty stacked on Wednesday (and I have a hard cut-off at 6:30 — Hadestown!). We could split 
up, or ask if she could do another day . . . thoughts, 
From: 
sc> 
Sent: Friday, October 18, 2019 19:17 
To: 
Subject: Fwd: Urgent. I have a new alleged victim of E I have a new client who was a victim of Epstein. She is willing to fly 
to New York for the victim meeting on Oct. 23. May I call you at 5:45 P.M. to discuss ? 
Gloria just left me a vm— she said the client is a victim form the 90s and is willing to be interviewed on Wednesday. I 
think she wants to know soon whether we want to do that, because it affects trial arrangements. I'll be on trial on 
Wednesday, so defer to you as to whether that fits your schedules. 
Sent from my iPhone
